title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: Get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama. Chat, generate, and embed with local LLMs.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript / TypeScript client for Ollama. Works in Node, Bun, Deno, and modern browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama. Use any LangChain abstraction with local Ollama models.

title: ollama-webui
summary: ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama (now renamed Open WebUI). Runs entirely in browser.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java / Kotlin client for Ollama. Simple fluent API to chat, generate and pull models.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper around Ollama with chat history, markdown, and syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama. Chat and generate completions in Ruby apps.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama models into a GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset. Use Ollama models in RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker image and compose examples for running Ollama containerized with GPU support.

title: ollama-vscode
summary: Lightweight VS Code extension to chat with any Ollama model inside the editor sidebar.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings + llama.cpp for retrieval QA.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU and persistence.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim client for Ollama. Small zero-dependency library for chat and generate endpoints.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing typed async client for the Ollama HTTP API.

title: ollama-rag-chatbot
summary: Streamlit chatbot that combines Ollama embeddings, Chroma vector DB and Llama-3 for PDF Q&A.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models via slash commands.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLM completions and summarization using Ollama inside notes.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C# / .NET client for Ollama with both sync and async APIs.
